posts.post_content: I now have two copies of this replacing Plains in my [Zur's Weirding](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zur's Weirding) deck. Posted By: Gaussgoat (1/13/2010 9:03:39 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Not the greatest land in the game, but its a decent life gain effect considering no actual mana is paid for it, and you get a white mana from it each turn afterwards.  
  
Maybe able to be abused in land returning decks. Something like moonfolk maybe?  
  
or if you are a fan of the [Zuran Orb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zuran Orb), [Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond), and [Crucible of Worlds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crucible of Worlds) combo...2 more life for playing it each time!
posts.html:
Not the greatest land in the game, but its a decent life gain effect considering no actual mana is paid for it, and you get a white mana from it each turn afterwards.

Maybe able to be abused in land returning decks. Something like moonfolk maybe?

or if you are a fan of the Zuran Orb, Fastbond, and Crucible of Worlds combo...2 more life for playing it each time!
